description: Cheerful 3 Bedroom Mountain Cottage
name: Cottage in Moretown
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted by Tom6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in January 2012**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located cottage. Perfectly situated between Waterbury and Waitsfield allows for easy rides to surrounding mountains and towns. Whether you're here to unwind or adventure our cottage will meet you where you are.The spaceTransport to our quintessential Vermont home tucked on the hillside of a quiet dirt road. Enjoy easy drives to neighboring towns like Stowe, Waterbury, and Waitsfield allowing you to be  minutes away from your outdoor adventure or meal. Our 1800's cottage was fully renovated to fit the needs of modern comfort while maintaining its vintage charm. The open floor plan on the first floor offers an abundance of light and brings the tranquility of the outdoors in. Enter through the side of the home into a sitting area with a TV. Ditch your boots and coats and head into the living space which opens into the kitchen and dining room,  making conversation easy regardless of the room you're in. A centrally placed gas stove spreads warmth and cozy vibes for all to enjoy. The first floor bathroom boasts an open air shower with views of the pines or unwind in the claw foot tub. The stairs to the second floor are steeper (and maybe a little creakier) than usual and take you to the landing which all bedrooms are accessed from. The rustic floorboards lead you to either a Queen room (x2) or the Master with a King bed and walk in closet. There is a brand new full bath off the landing. The backyard offers a stone patio to enjoy summer meals under the stars. There is a 'stream' that runs through the property which adds peaceful background noise in addition to the many other sounds of nature you'll find here. The home backs up to 100's of acres of protected land further supporting the  remote feel of the cottage.During snow/mud season in Vermont we recommend AWD or 4WD.

description: Gorgeous Treehouse Cozy Winter Paradise. Fire view
name: Treehouse in Moretown
unit rental details: Treehouse hosted by Peter4 guests ·  · 2 beds ·  · Half-bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · Half-bath**__**Joined in August 2013**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Lilla Rustica is an elevated cabin among the trees.  Private, with Stunning views this was built by "The Tree House Guys" a local Vermont company whom can be found having a season on the DIY network.  Tons of detail, while keeping the design natural and simple.  Unbelievable views of Camels hump State park. A loft with one queen bed and downstairs has a queen bed with three sides of the bed having windows facing the views.  Hiking offered right from the cabin. An awesome getaway!The spaceLilla Rustica cabin in the trees has a beautiful nestled in feel with incredible views from all windows.  One of the highlights is the downstairs queen bed.  Surrounded on three sides by windows you can look at the stars while lying in bed, or perhaps hear deer walk under the cabin while sleeping.  Feel far from it all while still close to route 100 in Vermont which has Ben and Jerry's, Prohibition Pig, Stowe, Sugar Bush and the Mad River Valley, Lawsons and The Alchemist breweries, Lot of swimming holes and tons of hiking and mountain biking.Internet is provided as well as a small refrigerator, and luxurious sheets and pillows.  Stay warm and cozy inside the treehouse with a propane fireplace.Water is limited up in the trees, but you will be provided with all you need of some of the best Spring water you may have ever tasted.  There is not a shower at this point in Lilla Rustica.  We hope in the future build an outdoor shower, but for longer stays there are swimming holes, gyms and spas close by.  The toilet for the cabin is located just at the end of ramp from the front door.  About a 5 second walk.  It is private for those staying in Lilla Rustica.  It is a porta pottty built to look like an outhouse.  The advantage to this is that is rarely used and only by those guests of the cabin as well as fully cleaned and emptied very often.  Having a toilet up in the trees is difficult.  We know how important a clean bathroom is to guests and we think you will be pleasantly surprised with the experience.  Beautiful cups and dishes are provided, dish towels, sheets, water, a way to make coffee and a small single burner gas stove.  This cabin is super cozy and perhaps best for a couple.  However, groups of four out having adventures during the day will love to come back to the cabin and enjoy its cozy feel in the evening. Unfortunately we no longer allow pets.

more description:
Beautiful home with mountain views. Open concept with cathedral ceilings and beams in the kitchen, dining, sitting area, and living room. Separate King bedroom, twin bedroom and walk-in closet and open loft with King bed. Outdoor hot tub with a gorgeous view. 

4WD W/ Snow tires highly recommended for access!

Close to Ski Areas - 19 min. (10 m) Sugarbush Mt. Ellen; 20 min. (11.4 m); Mad River Glen and 22 min. (13 m) Sugarbush Resort.Other things to notePlease note that there is little to no cell phone coverage in this area and all calls/text must be made via wifi calling.

Once booked over this medium you automatically agree to all terms and conditions stated below and the booking will act as your signature.

RELEASE & WAIVER OF LIABILITY AND INDEMNITY AGREEMENT IN CONSIDERATION for being permitted to enter premises and property for vacation rental or any other purpose, the undersigned, for himself/herself, his/her personal representatives, guests, children, heirs, and next of kin, acknowledges, agrees, and represents that he/she has or will immediately upon entering, and will continuously thereafter, thoroughly inspect such areas and his/her continued presence constitutes an acknowledgment that he/she has inspected house, deck and entire property and he/she finds and accepts such areas as being safe and reasonably suited for the purposes of his/her use, and he/she further agrees and warrants that if, at any time, he/she feels anything to be unsafe, he/she and all guests will immediately leave the area and advise appropriate persons. 

THE UNDERSIGNED hereby RELEASES, WAIVES, DISCHARGES AND COVENANTS NOT TO SUE the host or homeowner or listing company personally and as company or corporate representatives, their members, managers, operators, officials, officers, directors, employees, owners and lessees of the premises, all for the purposes herein referred to as “releasees”, from all liability to the undersigned, guests, representatives, assigns, heirs and next of kin for any and all loss or damage, and any claim or demand thereof on account of INJURY to the person(s) or property or resulting in DEATH of the undersigned or guests, whether caused by negligence of the releasees or otherwise while in or upon the area. 

THE UNDERSIGNED hereby AGREES TO INDEMNIFY AND SAVE AND HOLD HARMLESS the releasees and each of them from any loss, liability, damage, or cost they may occur due to their presence in or upon the area and whether caused by the negligence of the releasees or otherwise. WARNING: Use of hot tub, swimming pool, and/or fireplace carries risk that may result in serious injury or death, and unsupervised use by children is prohibited. Elderly persons, pregnant ladies, infants and anyone subject to heart disease, diabetes, low or high blood pressure, strokes, epilepsy or similar afflictions should not enter a spa or pool alone and without consulting their physician. Never use the spa or pool while under the influence of drugs or alcohol. If you are taking medication of any kind, or being treated for any illness, consult your physician prior to use of spa or pool. Spa should be kept at a temperature less than 104˚ for personal safety. DO NOT WALK ON SPA COVER or it will collapse. Supervise children at all times to decrease risk of injury or drowning. Spa must be shocked frequently to prevent bacterial growth and possibility of contracting communicable skin disorders, and bathers should shower immediately after use. It is the renter’s responsibility to check chemical levels.  Hot tubs and/or pools can cause serious death or injury.  Guests agree to use both the hot tub and/or pool at their own risk. 
THE UNDERSIGNED hereby ASSUMES FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR RISK OF BODILY INJURY, DEATH OR PROPERTY DAMAGE due to the negligence of the releasees or otherwise while in or upon area. THE UNDERSIGNED hereby certifies that he/she and guests (they) have adequate insurance to cover any injury, illness or damage that may be caused or suffered while in or upon area, or else agrees to bear the costs of such damage or injury. The undersigned further that he/she/they have no medical conditions which would interfere with use of hot tub, swimming pool, hiking, climbing stairs or else assume and bear the costs of all risks that may be created, directly or indirectly, by any such condition and expressly acknowledges such physical activities are dangerous and involve the risk of serious injury and/or death and/or property damage. The undersigned further expressly agrees that the foregoing release, waiver and indemnity agreement is intended to be as broad and inclusive as is permitted by law and that if any provision is held invalid, it is agreed that the balance shall, notwithstanding, continue in full legal force and effect. Any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of or related to this Agreement or the interpretation of this Agreement shall be settled by arbitration in accordance to the rules of the American Arbitration Association, except to the extent modified below. The place of arbitration shall be Washington County, VT. 

THE UNDERSIGNED HAS READ, UNDERSTANDS THE RISKS, AND VOLUNTARILY SIGNS THE RELEASE AND WAIVER OF LIABILTY AND INDEMNITY AGREEMENT, and further agrees that no oral representations, statements, or inducements apart from the foregoing written agreement have been made. Cancellations: Also, stating that you have reviewed and agree to the terms and policies stated on the Rates/Reservations page on the listing. If there are any uncertainties please purchase one of the vacation protection plans offered online prior to arrival. Bugs and pests: The cabins are up adjacent the Green Mountain National forest and although we perform regular pest control on the cabins we cannot guarantee it to be pest free of all bugs and animal and pests. We cannot compensate for the presence of pests, insects and animals. We also ask that all guests respect nature that you Do Not feed wildlife. Road conditions: Recommend four wheel drive in Winter/snow months with snow tires. We do not refund due to weather conditions.  The road will be plowed as soon as the local plow person has done so and at his discretion.  The owner or host is not required to help remove a stuck vehicle or reimburse for any towing on or off the property. Code of conduct rules must be followed by all guests: In appropriate conduct/behavior includes and not limited to violence, verbal or physical abuse, violating all part of this said agreement, act or acts that threaten the safety to others, loud music, repetitive noise that disturbs others, annoying to others or unauthorized services, programs or gatherings. Guests will be asked to leave and no refunds.

more description: Nestled in the woods, this classic Vermont home is a wonderful place to call home during your ski or summer vacations.  Centrally located to the Mad River Valley and Waterbury and 35 minutes to Stowe, this lovely home serves as a great launching pad for many different activities.  The home features an updated open plan concept upstairs great for enjoying time together.  In the summer, there is a spring fed pond out back, fire pit, and a large deck to enjoy meals and the outdoors.  In wintertime, cozy up next to the pellet stove downstairs and read a book after a long day of skiing.  This cozy home will be sure to make you wonderful memories for years to come and have you visiting time and time again!Guest accessYou will have access to the entire house and surrounding property.

description: Waldhaus - Modern Forest Home
name: Cabin in Moretown
unit rental details: Entire cabin hosted by Brooke4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: We have taken great care in designing and renovating our home into the modern, cozy, sunny home that it is today. We are a 15-20 minute drive to Mad River Glen, Mt. Ellen and Sugarbush. You can bike, hike, or snowshoe right out our door. There are many restaurants and two grocery stores within a 15 minute drive in Waitsfield, 20 min to Waterbury. We have high speed fiber WiFi throughout our home.We welcome all guests and well behaved dogs (no cats at this time).The spaceWe spend most of our time in the living / dining room which is open to the kitchen. It's a bright space with many windows with mountain views in the winter and has a tree house feel with all the leaves in the summer. The kitchen features a full-sized refrigerator and top freezer, a dishwasher, dishes, and cooking utensils to accommodate 6-8 people. Kitchen items included are: coffee grinder, Chemex / pour over coffee maker, Nespresso machine, microwave, food processor, pots and pans, baking sheet, strainer, cutting boards.We provide a speaker for your use while visiting.There are two bedrooms each with a modern wooden barn door we built and hung. The larger bedroom has a queen sized bed (memory foam mattress with hypoallergenic cover) and the smaller bedroom has a set of bunk beds (twin-sized mattresses). Our bathroom has two windows, a tub / shower and new in 2021 Kenmore washer and dryer.There is a loft accessed via the wood ladder which features a TV and a futon sofa. We have an entry room for gear, coats, shoes, etc.You can find us on Insta @jaunt_escapes.

number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Just off a quiet dirt road, the Nest Studio is a bright and cozy space. Great for couples, the studio has a queen bed with an additional small twin pull out sofa, great for a little one. The newly remodeled Moretown studio is close to skiing, mountain biking, and hiking. The space is accessed by a set of stairs from a private entrance. Coffee and tea is provided. The space is equipped with a full kitchen, washer, dryer, and tiled shower.The spaceThe Nest Studio is an above garage apartment. There is a small sitting area and a 42 inch Smart TV where you can login to all your favorite streaming services. A desk in an alcove provides a great place to setup your work station. A dining table with two chairs is the perfect spot to look at the tree tops and enjoy the complimentary tea or coffee. The kitchen has an electric stove, microwave, coffee maker, and fridge. A washer and dryer are also available with laundry detergent. The windows have blackout shades for lazy mornings and  there is a white noise machine next to the bed. The attached home is our full time residence. We ask that guests enjoy the property but not use the yard area in front of the main house.

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: My dad and I built this home from 2015-2019 working mostly on the weekends.  We did everything we could ourselves including all the framing, siding, and fine woodworking.  It has abundant natural and artificial light and a beautiful deck/porch.  We made sure to build a lot of storage space with built in closets, cabinets, and drawers.I am very proud of what we accomplished and I'm so excited to be able to share our creation with guests.The spaceIn the winter months (Dec-Feb) there is a good chance you will NEED to use the wood stove.  Wood stoves are great but they are a bit of work.  I have all the wood, kindling and paper you need but you will have to be able to bring it up a steep set of stairs.  Detailed directions for the wood stove are provided.The house also has an electric heat pump. It works great for the spring and fall and as a supplement to the wood stove in the winter.  When it gets below 10F or so the heat pump becomes less efficient and the wood stove becomes necessary to keep the house warm.It can also do A/C for hot days in the summer.

description: Home on Flower Farm near VT’s best skiing & brews!
name: Home in Moretown
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Thomas6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1.5 baths**__**Joined in September 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Country setting adjacent to a flower farm only 3 minutes off 89 perfectly nestled between mountains that boast hiking, skiing and mountain biking and the best of Vermont's brewery and restaurant scene. Within 30 minutes to Sugarbush, Mad River Glen, Stowe and Bolton Valley (night skiing!) for your outdoor adventures.  With Waitsfield and Waterbury being less than 15 minutes away, it's an easy drive to two of the finest breweries, Lawsons and Prohibition Pig, that Vermont has to offer.The spaceGarage space available for one car and plenty of additional space for ski and snowboard equipment in the garage or breezeway. Sledding hill in the back perfect for fun with the kids. From February to April the owners will be accessing the basement through the outside hatch to start our annual flower plants. We will only do so from 9-4 and will not go through the house. A perk for you is an inside look at a flower farm!

more description: Bright and spacious home with a large deck, heated pool, hot tub, pool table, and East of the canal just 4 miles from the Village of Southampton.The spaceThis postmodern home is furnished with both elegance and comfort in mind.  The main level includes a large living room with fireplace, dining room, updated kitchen, master suite, one queen-sized bedroom, 2 singles bedroom, a full bath, and half bath.  Multiple sliders allow access to the deck from the living area and the queen bedroom. The lower level has a family room with a 77-inch television, laundry room, full bathroom, a king-sized bedroom, and a queen bedroom with a Zoom-ready office setup.  Access to the garage and driveway from this level.

description: New Construction Wooded Oasis in Southampton!
name: Home in Southampton
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Josh At ARCH Co10 guests ·  · 5 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 6 baths
number of guests: 10 guests · **__** · 5 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 6 baths**__**Joined in May 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Heart of Southampton!  Min. to beach & village!-5 bedrooms w/ own en-suite bathrooms (6 baths)-Custom designed home hosted by a couple who is a Fashion Director (wife) and Hotel Architect/Builder (husband). -New heated gunite pool, hot tub, BBQ!-Pool House w/ sauna-Professional landscaped backyard & lighting!-Game Room w/ shuffleboard table-SONOS inside and outside!-Gas fireplace -Movie theater-Smart Home w/ Central Heating & Air ConditioningEnjoy 2 houses- great for the in-laws!The spaceWelcome to your brand New Construction vacation Hamptons escape! With everything you and your extended family need in a convenient location in the Heart of Southampton in Tuckahoe Woods Preserve.  Perfect for family fun or the coworker stay where every bedroom is like a master!   And don't forget the coveted guest-house with a separate kitchette, bathroom, and sauna!  Only 10 minutes to the best Beach on the East Coast- Coopers Beach and 7 minutes to the village for shopping and dining!  In town for golf? Only 5 minutes from Shinnecock Hills Golf Club, National Golf Links of America, and Sebonack Golf Club. With an open floor plan for gathering and entertaining, you can warm up with the huge gas fireplace in the heart of the home.  Open the double sets of French doors to the private deck with large sectional sofa and patio with cushioned dining set.  Enjoy open air living while listening to Sonos sound system inside and out. Play some games with friends in the den off the main living space.  Lounge by the new heated gunite pool (with removable safety fence- great for kids!) and 8 new lounge chairs, sectional sofa in the professionally landscaped backyard with new sod and beautiful landscape lighting. Kick back with a drink from the kitchenette in the pool house. Let the kids enjoy the private play area with a swing-set and slide. Enjoy a soak in the new hot tub all year round! Got a rainy day? That’s a great excuse to stay in and watch a movie on the big screen in the movie theater. Retreat to your 5 huge hotel-like guest suite bedrooms each with their own spa like bathrooms and all with King beds!  The facts:Brand New Custom Home designed with hospitality in mind:  (See floor plans for more details)-5 bedrooms  / 6 bathrooms--Bed 1: KING--Bed 2: KING--Bed 3: KING (or 2 twins as needed)--Bed 4: KING (Lower Level Theater)--Bed 5: KING (Guest House)(2 cribs also available for any room)**Pets considered- must be pre approved.**New- routine maid’s service available!

number of guests: 12 guests · **__** · 6 bedrooms · **__** · 7 beds · **__** · 6 baths**__**Joined in December 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: SPECIAL NOTE: Kindly message us for weekly and monthly discounts.​​​​​​​Bring family and friends to this newly constructed luxury modern Hampton retreat! This 6 bedroom, 6 bathroom quintessential luxury home is equally located to both the bustling Village of Southampton & Sag Harbor - about a 10min drive to each location! Thanks to the open floor plan, the primary living room, dining room, and kitchen are all within the same grand space on the main level. Feel free to dine casually around the large kitchen island, formally at the dining table, or carry the meal outdoors on the patio and enjoy whilst relishing in the Summer breeze. At the end of a long, fun-filled day, retire to the upper level to one of the five spacious bedrooms each with its own ensuite bathroom, and do enjoy a relaxing evening or nightcap on the balcony or by the firepit. Custom built and curated with stylish touches, this contemporary home offers over 5,000 square feet of interior living. Unwind in this beautifully appointed two-story newly built home which has 6 spacious bedrooms and 6 full bathrooms. This home has ample living room and entertaining space including an open bright and airy kitchen with new appliances and 2 in-unit washers and dryers (one on each floor). The grassy yard and mature plantings enhance the beauty of the surroundings. It has a spacious porch with a lot of outdoor furniture and dining.The patio area comes with an outdoor dining area and BBQ grill. Perfect for celebrating little victories or enjoying homemade burgers!⚠️ DISCLAIMER: Due to the Summer season, we have a landscaper scheduled to come over to the property weekly. Please expect a visit during your stay. Though they are only going to access the lawn or the outside area of the property.⚠️ DISCLAIMER: Please be advised that there's an ongoing pool construction at the property. The pool will be available starting May 2023.The spaceCOVID-19 Commitment to Cleanliness: As we welcome this amazing home, we have implemented enhanced cleaning practices to meet the health and cleanliness standard of Airbnb. We actively monitor our cleaning protocols and safety guidelines as an expression of care and commitment to our guests. 🏠 HOME LAYOUT• 1st FloorLiving Room, Family Room, Game Room/Den with Wet Bar, Office/Bedroom #6, Full Bathroom, Laundry Area, Butler Area, Dining Area• 2nd FloorAdditional Bedrooms, En-Suite Bathrooms, Laundry Room• Outdoor SettingLarge Porch, Outdoor Seating and Dining Area, Balcony, Backyard, Smart Speakers🛏️ BEDROOMThe home has six (6) bedrooms which sleep 12 guests. - Bedroom 1: King size bed (Sleeps 2 guests), En-suite Bathroom, His & Her Walk-in Closet, Common Balcony, Fireplace- Bedroom 2: Queen size bed (Sleeps 2 guests), En-suite Bathroom, Closet, Common Balcony- Bedroom 3: Queen size bed (Sleeps 2 guests), En-suite Bathroom, Closet, Common Balcony- Bedroom 4: Two Full size bed (Sleeps 4 guests), En-suite Bathroom, Closet- Bedroom 5: One Full size bunk bed w/ Trundle Bed (Sleeps 4 guests/6 children), En-suite Bathroom, Walk-In Closet- Bedroom 6/Office: Queen size sofa bed (Sleeps 2 guests) 🧻 BATHROOMThe home has 6 full luxury bathrooms. Bathrooms are supplied with bath essentials (shampoo, body wash), towels, toilet paper, and hairdryers. - Bathroom 1: En-suite bathroom with shower, soaker tub, toilet, double vanity- Bathroom 2: En-suite bathroom with shower, single vanity- Bathroom 3: En-suite bathroom with shower, single vanity- Bathroom 4: En-suite bathroom with shower, single vanity- Bathroom 5: En-suite bathroom with shower, single vanity- Bathroom 6: First-floor bathroom with shower, single vanity🧺 SHEETS/TOWELS PROVIDEDThe home is professionally cleaned before every stay with clean linens and towels. Fresh new sheets, linens, and towels will be provided for your stay. We will prepare based on the number of guests. • Linens (sheet sets for bed)• Blankets/Comforters• Bath Towels• Washcloths• Hand Towels🍳 KITCHENThe home features a modern, spacious, and upgraded kitchen. It is fully stocked and equipped with stainless steel appliances - you will have everything you need to make a nice meal with your family or friends.• Refrigerator• Dishwasher• Microwave• Gas Stove and Oven• French Press• Stand Mixer• Air Fryer• Toaster• Blender• Rice Cooker• Slow Cooker• Pots and Pans🍽️ DININGThe home features a formal dining area with a large custom dining table with seating for 8 (extends for 12) and an additional seating area for 6 more by the island counter, so everyone can enjoy a meal together! There is also an outdoor dining area if you feel like dining while enjoying the outdoors and the fresh breeze of nature. 🛋️ LIVING AREA  & FAMILY ROOMUpon entry, guests are greeted by a staircase that frames the open concept hallway leading to the living room and all other parts of the home. Gather in the spacious family room and lounge with your friends and family on the custom sofa, watch movies on the TV with streaming apps available and enjoy the coziness of the space with the fireplace. The family room opens to the deck and the backyard. 🍷 ENTERTAINMENT AREA The home features an entertainment area with a pool table and wet bar available for guests to enjoy during your time!• Pool Table • Wet Bar📍 LOCATIONThe property is located in a secluded corner of South Hamptons. Step outside for some fresh air and enjoy the backyard of the large grounds of the home, including the fire pit. This property is a 14-minute drive to Sag Harbor’s Main Street and a 10-minute drive to the village of South Hampton and Cooper Beach. There are a lot of nearby water activities like skiing and sailing available! You can go to the South Hampton's day beaches, ocean beach, the village of South Hampton, tour the many local wineries, play miniature golf, or have fun skating! The activities are endless, to say the least!• Southampton Village - 10min drive• Parrish Art Museum - 9min drive• Shinnecock Hills Golf Club - 9min drive • Old Town Beach - 12min drive • Flying Point Beach - 12min drive  • Cooper's Beach - 14min drive • Ponquogue Beach - 14min drive• Poxabogue Golf Course - 20min drive• Sag Harbor Golf Course (Barcelona Neck) - 20min drive🚘 PARKINGThe home has an outdoor driveway parking available for 4 cars. There is no additional street parking available. 🏡 OUTDOOR The home has an open deck area with outdoor furniture that include a dining table, lounge chairs, and an additional seating area. The home also features a huge lawn perfect for outdoor activities and games such as badminton and croquet. Revel in the outdoors by connecting to the Sonos speakers while enjoying some good music!📹 SECURITY & SAFETY FEATURESThe home is equipped with security cameras located on the exterior of the property. There are NO cameras inside the home. There are smoke alarms, fire extinguishers, and a first aid kit available. 🥌 OTHER AMENITIESThe home comes with high-speed internet access, hairdryers, an office bedroom area with dedicated workspace, a butler pantry, two laundry rooms, four functional gas fireplaces, an iron and iron board, the fire pit (new addition!), and Smart TVs for your streaming apps (Please use your own log-ins for Netflix, Hulu, etc., and make sure to log out of your account prior to checking out).​​​​​​​⚠️DISCLAIMER: We do not provide a propane tank for the fire pit. In addition, beers are available at home, however, you will have to replace them after consuming (please call us if you're unable to). 📋 HOUSE RULES• PETS: This property is not pet-friendly. The unauthorized bringing of pets will have a penalty of $300 which will go towards the deep cleaning of the property.• CHECK-IN: Check-in time is after 4 PM. Early check-in requests are subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed. If we're able to accommodate an early check-in, there's an early check-in fee of $50 starting at 10 AM. Please check the availability of early check-in prior to booking.• CHECK-OUT: Check-out time is before 11 AM. We do not allow late check-out as we schedule cleaning ahead of time. Any unauthorized late check-out will result in a charge of $50 for every 30 minutes.• SMOKING: We do not allow smoking inside the property or in outdoor spaces including the balcony, backyard, and terrace (if applicable). There is a smoking fine of $300. Smoking is only permitted by the fire pit. • NOISE: Please observe quiet hours after 9PM. Please be mindful of the neighbors as this property is situated in a quiet neighborhood. If the police are summoned due to noise complaints, this warrants a possible eviction with no refund.• DAMAGES & LOSS: We would truly appreciate it if you could treat our home like yours. You will be responsible for any damages or loss to the property which will be deducted from your security deposit. Excessive damage to the property will have a liability of up to $5000. Please advise us of any damage or loss immediately upon discovery.• UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS: Please make sure to book the property for the correct number of guests. Parties, events, or any kind of gathering are prohibited. Given the COVID-19 situation, no other guests outside the reservation are allowed on the property.• PHOTOSHOOT/MUSIC VIDEOS: This property is for residential use only and not for commercial purposes without the written permission of the owner. Please contact us directly for booking of events.

Please read the additional disclosures, guidelines, and rules.  No events, no parties, no smoking – no exceptions!The spaceSituated on a half-acre of land, this updated, modern residence offers a peaceful and quiet Hamptons getaway. The designer home is the perfect getaway for golf enthusiasts and for those who wish to relax by the pool, ocean or visit town. The residence includes 4 bedrooms and 3 new bathrooms, central air conditioning, an updated kitchen & heated pool, The generous living area is a lovely refuge, with natural hard wood floors,  and a 54"  Hi Def/3-D TV. With peace and relaxation in mind, the just finished kitchen flaunts Nella Vetrina Italian Cabinets, Porcelenosa Cabinets and Thomas O’Brien Light Fixtures to tie it all together!  The gourmet kitchen is home to an oversized island perfect for any chef and even better for hosting guests.  With Restoration Hardware, Serena and Lily and One Kings Lane furniture throughout this house flawlessly connects luxury lifestyle with the Hamptons oasis feel.  The kitchen opens up to a stunning dining room with Arteriors Pendant, that impeccably transitions into your living room with wood burning fireplace.  From there glass doors lead out to a gorgeous bluestone patio surrounding a 32x16ft pool. The primary, second and third bedrooms are beautifully decorated with Philip Jefferies wallpaper.  With two ensuite bathrooms, and central air conditioning this property is a must rent!”Bedroom Configuration2 kings, 2 twin, a day bed and a pull out sofa

more description: Slip into relaxation mode with your own private Hamptons sanctuary. Centrally located on a peaceful cul-de-sac, you will have access to all the Hamptons has to offer while feeling like you are away from it all. This bright, open-concept home features two fireplaces, renovated bathrooms, upscale furnishings and luxury touches like linen bedding. Sip a drink in the private den with wet bar or lounge/dine alfresco on the expansive deck while enjoying the mature trees. Close to beaches and town.The spaceThis classic expanded saltbox home features 4 large bedrooms and 3 full, renovated baths. The lower level has an open concept living/dining space and a separate den with wet bar. Sliding doors throughout lead to the large deck, creating a true indoor/outdoor living experience. The eat-in, chef's kitchen features an island, 2 dishwashers, gas stove, large second dining table and access to outside. A guest bedroom w a queen bed and ensuite bath completes the downstairs. Upstairs are 3 bedrooms, including a master with a king bed and ensuite bathroom with large glass enclosed shower. The two remaining guest bedrooms have queen beds and are connected by a Jack and Jill bathroom.  Washer/dryer are also upstairs.

Hair Dryer, iron, ironing board. 2 Complimentary bottles of water per day.

more description: Designer Sophia Lovito integrates a blend of contemporary design and costal furnishings to complete this fully renovated 4-Bedroom 3.5 Bath Southampton Colonial stunner, perfect for your retreat away from the cityThe home features a marble-dusted 20x40 Gunite Pool with 8x8 Hot Tub with Fire Pit, built-in Weber Grill and is fully stocked for your summer getawayEach bedroom features luxurious bedding and the theatre room will cap your lovely evenings in the HamptonsThe spaceThe home features a living room, dining room, fully built out basement with theatre area, family room with gas fireplace, breakfast seating, open concept and expansive countertop space.There are 4 Bedrooms in the home. The primary suite features a king bed, two bedrooms have queen beds and one bedroom has a full size bed. All bedrooms come with ample closet space for your getawayThe outdoor area features a stunning gunite pool with hot tub built in, 8 chaise lounge chairs poolside, 7 seater patio set with gas fire pit, built-in Weber Grill with an 8 person outdoor dining and a grass area for your pups to enjoy!

number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 3.5 baths**__**Joined in August 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Situated off of a quiet lane on one and a half-acres of land, this amazing residence offers a peaceful and quiet Hamptons getaway.  The home consists of 4 wonderful bedrooms,  3.5 modern bathrooms, a heated pool & mature landscaping. Additionally, please read my disclosures and "rules". Not a party house. No Events, parties & No smoking will be permitted. The house is beautiful, tranquil and very comfortable. THANK YOU!The spaceSituated off of a quiet lane on one and a half-acre of land on a very quiet Cul-Da-Sac, this residence offers a peaceful and quiet Hamptons getaway. The  home is the perfect getaway for golf enthusiasts and for those who wish to relax by the pool, ocean or visit town. The residence includes 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, central air conditioning, &  heated pool.  The generous living area is a lovely refuge, with natural hard wood floors,  and a 54" Samsung Hi Def/3-D TV.  The indoor dining table can accommodate 6 to 8 people. There are 2 counter stools at the kitchen bar area. A convenient washer and dryer combo is in the laundry area. The master bedroom easily fits the king size bed, and has an en-suite bathroom with a tub/shower. The master offers privacy and is separate from the guest rooms. In addition, the home has an Elliptical ready for you coupled w a very large outdoor trampoline.With peace and relaxation in mind, the living room's glass wall opens to the large private yard that feature, Blue and White Hydrangeas, French Lavender and Crepe Myrtle Trees. Surrounded by original blue stone walkways, enjoy the deep 30'-foot heated pool all summer long.  Bed Configuration: 1 Kings, 2 Queen and 2 Twins

more description: Looking for a getaway? Nestled into one of the largest preserves in the Hamptons, this sunny newly renovated beachy cottage is the perfect retreat. The legendary Hamptons beaches, Southampton Village, and the world famous golf courses are less than a 10 minute drive away. There are many nearby essential shops, farmers markets & restaurants. Set up for WFH with hi-speed wifi and a desk.The spaceThe home has been newly renovated with attention to detail. This pristine cottage has a wonderful gas stove along with all new kitchen appliances and laundry. There is a dining area, outdoor patio and multiple TV's. Over an acre worth of land - all yours! Watch the deer roam freely and enjoy the serenity of being set far back from the road.

name: Home in Water Mill
location: Water Mill, New York, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Carolyn8 guests ·  · 4 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 3.5 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 3.5 baths**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our 4BR airy home in a prime Hamptons location--Water Mill South--offers comfort, luxury, and tranquility, all while being just 5 min. away from ocean beaches, restaurants in Bridgehampton Village, and the area's best fields and farm stands.  Impeccably renovated, comfortable, family-oriented traditional shingle house is in a quiet, established neighborhood perfect for walks or bike rides.Please read the additional disclosures, guidelines, and rules.  No events, no parties, no smokingThe spaceImpeccably renovated and comfortable, this family-oriented traditional shingle house is in a quiet, established neighborhood on an ambling 1-mile circle perfect for walks or bike rides. Five min. drive from some of the best restaurants, shopping and kids' activities in the Hamptons (Bridgehampton Village). The home is in the perfect location for central Hamptons: Five minutes' drive from Water Mill and Bridgehampton Villages; ten minutes from Southampton and Sag Harbor; 15 minutes from East Hampton. Kid friendly, designer-decorated home in prime location just 5 min. drive or pedal from the most popular Southampton's best family beaches (Mecox, Flying Point, and Ocean Rd in Bridgehampton)!The property offers a peaceful one block from Mecox Bay, gorgeous sunsets, and peaceful waterfront scenery. The house comes with state-of-the-art smart technology for indoor-outdoor living, featuring a heated saltwater pool, decorated outdoor deck, full private outdoor shower off the downstairs MBR, and propane grill with outdoor dining patio (seats 8). ; chef's kitchen, lovely grounds and pool, bluestone terraces, secret garden and 5 minutes to ocean.Home layout:Downstairs, the primary MBR suite spills open to the outdoors and private outdoor shower via a pair of French doors. Separated, on the other side of the first floor, is a spacious, very sunny fully renovated kitchen; family room / dining room, and a sunny living room with TV and double French doors linking two outdoor terraces.Upstairs, there are three bedrooms. In addition to the self-contained MBR suite, there is a room with twin kids’ beds (bunk beds) and 2 closets;  this room shares a bathroom (bathtub / shower), with the fourth bedroom: a queen bed on a corner exposure, with french doors overlooking a patio and the outdoors.Bed Configuration2 Kings, 1 Full, 2 Twins

name: Condo in Seattle
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Ashley & Mike4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath

more description: Our spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath home is located in the heart of Seattle. Mere minutes from Pike Place, The Space Needle and some of Seattle’s best restaurants, our home is the perfect getaway for families, business travelers and solo adventurers.The spaceOur home has modern furnishings, an HD television in the living room equipped with a Roku and an antenna. In this space, you will have 1 brand new king sized bed in the master bedroom, a memory foam folding floor mattress, and a premium sleeper sofa (it is actually comfortable!) in the living room to add an extra sleeping option when needed. The kitchen is fully equipped to please any cook, and there is a brand new washer/dryer in the condo for your convenience. Tall oversized windows throughout the condo provide plenty of natural light and a beautiful city view including a peekaboo view of the Space Needle! Our home also includes wireless internet and a large electric air conditioning unit. We have one of the rare homes in downtown Seattle that has a reserved parking spot in our secure garage! The building complex has a garden courtyard with fountains, a gym, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, spa, large club room and a stunning roof-top deck with barbecues. There is also a secure garage parking for one car that is included in your reservation.* If this unit is booked, please check out our other units under our profile.* Please message us about yourself (age, gender, etc) before booking.* Also be sure to have a picture and verification.* If possible, let us know your check in and check out times

description: Ferry Ride Room: Private room & bath near Seattle
name: Private room in Shoreline
unit rental details: Private room in home hosted by Laura2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 private bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 private bath**__**Joined in October 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Experience the city or the outdoors while retreating in this cozy neighborhood home. Close to I-5 and Hwy 99, within 20 minutes you could be in downtown Seattle, hiking a forest trail, or taking a ferry ride across the Puget Sound. Ferry Ride Room is your beautiful, private room with private bath, mini-fridge, Keurig, iron/board, wi-fi, queen-size bed, and a repurposed 1920's armoire to die for. An incredible value compared to listings in downtown.The spacePassage House is our family home that we love sharing. Our main goal is for you to feel at home in this space by being, not a place to escape real life, but a place to feel peaceful and safe in the midst of real life. This means you'll experience the ambiance of the Ferry Ride Room, representing a peaceful passage across the Sound on a foggy morning, but you'll also hear the bumping and giggling (and sometimes crying) of our four kids throughout the house. The shared entrance leads straight into the hallway with your private room & bath. Everything is ready to make you feel welcome and at home.The space includes (but is not limited to):+ queen bed+ private bathroom with bath/shower that'll make you want to bring pink tubs back!+ mini-fridge+keurig+plates, cups, cutlery, paper towels, etc.+ wood floors + ecologically friendly all LED lighting+ highspeed wifi+closet with hangers, iron & ironing board+central heating (though the control panel is in a different area of the house so you won't have access to temperature control)+portable fan/heaterNote: Your safety and security is my concern. To this end, there are smoke & carbon monoxide detectors, fire extinguishers, and a first aid kit.Note: Your room is next to the only stairwell up to our part of the house. We try to not use this very often, however, you will occasionally see us heading up to the upstairs of the house. If you're new to Seattle, I'm happy to assist you in planning and getting around. Once rented, I have a strict policy of not entering your space unless there is an absolute and critical emergency.The nearest shopping plaza a mile away has all your needs, including: supermarket, Trader Joes, Starbucks, Orange Theory gym, drugstore, post office, a few restaurants (including pizza and frozen yogurt), etc. There are several parks within a short walking distance.We do not have a driveway to park in, however there is always plenty of free street parking (enough that you won't have to parallel park if you don't want to :)

more description: I love historical buildings with character. You can hang your hat here for a day or a month in comfort: a restful queen bed, a kitchen equipped for cooking, a desk to plan or work. It's steps from public transportation, top restaurants, Seattle U and Swedish Hospital, and a short pleasant walk to Capitol Hill's Pike/Pine district. Street parking is readily available.Downstairs, drop in at Peloton Cafe for quality food & beer. Ba Bar, everyone's favorite for Vietnamese, is always buzzing.The spaceThe space is a one-bedroom apartment one floor up in a small, family-owned apartment building. With its spacious queen bed, the apartment sleeps two comfortably; the sofa bed sleeps up to two more. It's clean and minimalist, with a nicely equipped kitchen, full bathroom, and comfortable living room. We offer a travel crib for families with infant or toddler (please request in advance). And free big-screen Netflix, for chilling out at the end of a busy (or lazy!) day. :)

more description: Our modern 1 bedroom, 1 bath home is located in the heart of Seattle. Mere minutes from Pike Place, The Space Needle and some of Seattle’s best restaurants, our home is the perfect getaway for families, business travelers and solo adventurers.The spaceOur home has modern furnishings, a plasma TV in high definition and a smaller flat screen in the bedroom- both equipped with rokus. In this space, you will have 1 brand new queen sized bed in the master bedroom and 1 memory foam floor mattress (it is actually comfortable!) in the living room to add an extra sleeping option when needed. The kitchen is fully equipped to please any cook, and there is a washer/dryer in the condo for your convenience. Tall oversized windows throughout the condo provide plenty of natural light and expansive city views. Our home also includes wireless internet.We have one of the rare homes in downtown Seattle that has a reserved parking spot in our secure garage!The building complex has a garden courtyard with fountains, a gym, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, spa, large club room and a stunning roof-top deck with barbecues. more description: This beautiful 1-Bedroom Guest Suite in our guest house is located in Green Lake, one of Seattle's best neighborhoods. It was fully updated in October 2017, and features one bedroom with a new queen bed, and a living area with a queen sofabed. We are short block from beautiful Green Lake, and walking distance to many great local restaurants, cafes, shops and outdoor activities, as well as a short drive (or long walk) to the Univ. of Washington and the Zoo. Limited parking is available.The spaceThis private Guest Suite is perfect for 2 people who want a residential retreat in a vital Seattle neighborhood. The Suite is made up of one bedroom, a living room, and a full bath.  The living room has a large leather pullout couch (that can sleep an additional two people), a TV, a table that can be used as a laptop desk or breakfast table; and a minimalist kitchenette consisting of a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, plates, silverware, and coffee & tea.  Other amenities include:  Wifi, TV, Netflix streaming, heating, fans, linens, hair dryer, shampoo, and conditioner.

Unit professionally serviced with toiletries and hotel-grade, hypoallergenic linens & towels. Steps to restaurants and coffee shops. Fiber internet. Walk score: 85.The spacePerfect blend of quiet, comfortable and close to everything you might want to do for work or play. After exploring our beautiful city or our famous natural landscapes, retreat to a clean, relaxing apartment with dedicated off-street parking, a very comfortable King bed, full kitchen and a washer-dryer in a peaceful neighborhood.

more description: It’s no secret. Manhattan has the best, if not the most options for dining, shopping, and entertainment on the planet. Booking a room in the hip and cozy Staypineapple in Midtown puts you right in the heart of the action so you can get the most out of your NYC vacay. An amenity fee with tax ($28.69 per day) will be charged upon arrival.Daily pet fees apply.The spaceThe rooms feature plush ambience with modern furniture to provide a peaceful night’s rest in the city that never sleeps. Enjoy the signature Naked Experience that includes duvet beds with luxury towels and robes to provide maximum comfort. Free high-speed Wi-Fi, high-def televisions with premium channels, and complimentary Kuerig coffee and tea are all standard.Midtown Manhattan is the home for some of New York’s top attractions. The Theater District, Central Park, Times Square, and Madison Square Garden are the most notable. With subway stops spread all over the city, you’ll have direct access to all of the destinations on your list. Your room will have: Private bathroomDaily housekeepingBlackout drapes/curtainsAir conditioningDaily housekeeping  The space offers:24-hour front deskLaundry serviceConcierge servicesLuggage storageElevator

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 private bath**__**Joined in June 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Spend your time in New York City relaxing in a chic studio in the heart of one of New York’s coolest neighborhoods. The arty, laid back ridge is your go-to, hidden away on the ever-eclectic (and noticeably less touristy) Lower East Side. Enjoy the breathtaking skyline views from our rooftop and the commodity of our communal kitchen and work-space basement. The small but comfortable and chicly designed units will make you feel right at home and provide everything you need for any kind of stay.The spaceDid you know that most hotels charge an average of $35 on daily and hidden fees for services you never use? The ridge is redefining the way lodging is done. We strive to make your stay safer, more efficient, and affordable. With our new operating model we were able to remove all hidden and resort fees so you only pay for what you need. With 24/7 virtual reception, faster and easier contactless express check-in and check-out, pre-arrival and post departure housekeeping, you won’t ever have to pay for daily amenities you don’t use.This minimalist room keeps it simple but classy and with everything you need for a wonderful stay. Come back after a long day exploring the world’s most exiting city to enjoy a warm shower in our newly renovated bathrooms. After lay on our comfortable top of the line queen size bed and unwind as you watch some Cable TV or streaming services in our smart TVs. Share all the new cool photos with your loved ones via our high-speed WI-FI. Best of all, when you stay with us, you are not limited to the small space of the typical New York micro apartments. Here you can enjoy a meal or a drink at our beautiful rooftop terrace with some of the most amazing New York skyline views. You will also have access to our communal kitchen and work-space area where you can meet new friends and work on a larger environment.The ridge will provide you with a 24/7 virtual reception that is ready to assist you with all your needs at any time. We provide you with a pristine clean unit filled with the essentials you need for your stay, and we make sure we leave it the same way when you leave. We will provide you with easy and safe express check-out and check-in, and all the tools you need for an amazing space.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Welcome to City Hall Park, where the hustle and bustle of FiDi melt away. Have your cameras ready to capture beautiful archways and floor-to-ceiling greenery. Inside your space, biophilic design and earthy colors set a calming tone. May we suggest dinner at Maestro Pasta, just a block away? Or opt for views of the Hudson River on the Staten Island Ferry. Your NYC story begins at City Hall Park. The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Kitchenette
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming
- Communal laundry room

What's nearby
- 2 min walk to La Parisienne (French café featuring pastries and coffees)
- 3 min walk to Da Claudio (try the rosemary pappardelle with sun-dried tomato pesto)
- 4 minute walk to The Bar Room at The Beekman (old fashioned swanky bar with bookshelf walls)
- 5 minute walk to New York Stock Exchange
- 10 minute walk to Battery Park

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay—while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2013**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Located in the East Village, our private guest studio (1 person occupancy only, sorry no exceptions) has tons of light and a true city feeling. The 135sqft space is newly renovated and has a modern full bathroom. Enjoy a micro-kitchenette complete with a nespresso vertuo coffee, mini-fridge stocked with complimentary snacks, yogurt, whole milk, granola (no stove/microwave). Close to major subway lines and Citi Bike stations! 4th floor walk-up.The spaceThe small but well equipped 135 sqft studio accommodates 1 person (sorry no exceptions) and has a modern bathroom with a Toto toilet, standing shower, 4 medium firm pillows, small closet, luggage rack and overhead storage for your empty luggage. You will have a comfortable full-size bed with luxurious Brooklinen cotton sheets, soft towels, and a duvet. New smart AC window unit for the warm months (May 20th - Oct 20th) and cozy radiator heating for the cold months. TV with cable and streaming. The Studio is located on the 4th-floor walkup in a beautiful family owned prewar building.We have taken Airbnb's Living Wage Pledge.  We pay our self-employed cleaner a living wage that aligns with the National Domestic Workers Alliance (NDWA) standards.

more description: The private studio apartment is very peaceful and quiet in regards to sounds from the building and outdoors(rare for the city!). It is right in the heart of the upper east side and with that you are minutes away from the Museum Mile, Central Park and have wonderful Dining options around you as well as Subways, Cabs, Bikes and Grocery options. The UES is very safe and a lovely place to be!The spaceSharing my very quiet and peaceful Upper East Side Studio Apartment.The bed is a day-bed/trundle and there is a comfy sofa as well so you if you are 2 guests, you can either sleep both sep. or in a pulled out trundleYou are welcome to use my fully equipped kitchen in a reasonable amount. There is a little extra desk if you need to work. The bathroom is small but has a bathtub. There is a fire escape I personally love sitting on. The heater can not be regulated in the apartment(it can also be slightly noisy at times..) so it gets pretty warm in winter..welcome to nyc apartments..This is my private living space so there are personal items visible..

more description: Located in a historic brownstone walk-up in Central Harlem. This room in a large shared home is perfect for anyone wanting to experience NYC the way locals do. We are two blocks from an express subway station with easy access to just about anywhere. This is a 5th floor walk up. If you're a fan of the show Friends - you'll love this room! (If you hate that show, don't worry, we're close to great transportation so you can run away!)The spaceThe private room is well lit and spacious - and the living room and kitchen are beautiful rooms to spend time in when you're not out exploring the city.As a guest in our home you will have access to the shared bathroom, kitchen and living room. Feel free to use the small automatic coffee pot in the kitchen - coffee (from Whole Foods) is included.  In the living rom, enjoy any of the streaming you can access through the AppleTV! We have a lot of streaming services. Please read included amenities carefully to understand fully what is included with your room and what is not.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This listing is for a 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment. Great location in Lower Manhattan, awesome neighborhood, and a short walk from multiple subway stations. A tastefully furnished home that's fully equipped with everything guests could need. It's a modern and bright space that has a living room, kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom. You can settle into this hidden gem of an apartment and take a break from the hustle and bustle of NYC life.The spaceThe apartment gets tons of light, my home is equipped with everything guests could need from a washer, dryer, dishwasher, fast wifi, towels to basic toiletries, linens, pillows, cookware, elevator building, etc.Please note that this space is my home and not a hotel. While it is clean and fully furnished, there is general wear and tear in the apartment. I rent out my space when I am out of town for work, so I lock the bedroom closet but provide a clothes rail with storage and hangers for guests. This is a newer condo building but it is not a luxury, high-end space. It is a modest, real New York City apartment. That means you can hear the occasional street noise like a subway train a few blocks away or the garbage trucks in the morning (1-2 times per week) etc. While I always try to make myself available to help guests ASAP, there is no on-site contact or a 24/7 concierge. I prefer to inform guests upfront so that there is no confusion regarding expectations.

description: Almond Blossoms at TG Park | Fenced Backyard+W/D
name: Apartment in St. Louis
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Brandon4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Almond Blossoms is a bright, gorgeous, tastefully appointed flat in one of the best locations in Saint Louis.  The apartment is nestled between the beautiful Tower Grove Park and the eclectic restaurants and bars on South Grand in the majestic Tower Grove Heights.  Work up your appetite with a stroll through the park, cross the road to South Grand to sample world-class international cuisine, cocktails, and craft beers, and return home to your stunningly beautiful place for some R+R.The space☆☆Almond Blossoms Highlights☆☆☆ The Neighborhood ☆ Tower Grove + The International District☆ Take the short 5 block walk to Grand Blvd to sample the international cuisine and experience the eclectic bars of South Grand, or cross the road and take a stroll in the elegant 19th-century Victorian walking park known as Tower Grove Park.  If you're here for tourism, then you've chosen the perfect location-it's a quick 10-minute (or less) drive to basically every other tourist destination in St. Louis: Soulard (Anheuser-Busch Brewery, historic district, dining/nightlife), Lafayette Square (historic district), Downtown (the arch/Laclede's landing, Busch Stadium, the Scottrade center, dining/nightlife), the Central West End (Cathedral Basilica, Forest Park, World Chess Hall of Fame, dining/nightlife), the Grove (dining/nightlife), the Hill (historic district, Italian dining), the Loop (historic district, dining/nightlife).☆Bedroom☆The cozy bedroom overlooks the fenced backyard and features hardwood floors, a comfortable high-end queen bed with high-quality, 100% cotton sheets, mid-century modern dresser, a full-length mirror, and a closet.  The bedroom features a gorgeous 3-panel painting of Van Gogh's "Almond Blossoms".☆Kitchen☆The full kitchen features a stainless steel refrigerator, stove, oven, dishwasher, and microwave, and Edison lighting over exposed brick walls.  The kitchen comes chef-ready, with pots and pans, dishes, glasses, utensils, and basic condiments like salt, pepper, and oil provided free of charge.  We also provide our guests with an assortment of complimentary teas, coffee, and purified Brita water.  ☆Living Room☆The living room features wall-to-wall  hardwood floors, bright windows, a large closet, and a stylish sofa.  Should you require an additional bed, the sofa sleeper converts to full-size bed by moving the ottoman over to form a rectangular platform and applying linens (provided on request).  The living room is also equipped with a 50" flat screen, 4K Smart TV with complimentary Netflix.  ☆Dining Room☆The gorgeous dining room features wall-to-wall hardwood floors, decorative lighting, and a large polished wood dining room table with four leather chairs.  The artwork is Van Gogh's "Cafe Terrace at Night".☆Bathrooms☆The newly remodeled bathroom features tiled walls with premium stainless fixtures and granite countertops.  The bathroom is stocked with complimentary, high-quality, all-natural artisan shampoo, conditioner, and body wash from Beekman 1802.  The bathrooms are stocked with fresh towels for your stay. ☆Laundry and Storage☆This apartment includes the use of a private storage facility with full-size washer and dryer.  We provide laundry detergent and other supplies free of charge.☆Backyard☆This apartment features a private, fenced community backyard.  Great for guests bringing pets!☆Walk Score☆Starry Night has a Walk Score of 71, or 'Very Walkable'.☆Safety Rank☆The Saint Louis Dispatch tracks and publishes crime statistics for Saint Louis's 77 neighborhoods and ranks each neighborhood by safety (#1 is the safest).  Starry Night is located in Tower Grove South, which is ranked #20 of 77.

more description: With all the charm of a southern provincial Victorian estate in the heart of STL, this solar-powered, recently renovated 129-years-young home boasts a low carbon footprint!  A spacious wrap-around veranda overlooks flowering terraces; while the interior offers abundant common space (2 kitchens, sunroom, dining, living, deck, grill). Private rooms come with personal TV, DVD, and guest accounts for Netflix, Hulu, Prime, and HBOnow.  Organic raised bed garden in back.  Adjacent to YMCA (with pool).The spaceCozy and bright room (second floor) with window AC unit, for personalized climate control.  With the feel of a European hostel, we have guests from all over the world.  The 1st and 2nd floor provide two lightly stocked kitchens where you can snack on anything that is not labeled with another guests name.  There are two bathrooms with renewable bamboo toilet paper and other toiletries. Ample common space, both indoors and out (dining room, living room, sunroom, veranda).   Three security cameras protecting entries.  Towels, linens, fans, space heaters, cleaning supplies and hospitality items are provided in the room.

more description: Basement suite (studio) in historical house located in beautiful Lafayette Square. Only 1 block away from park, coffee shop and restaurants. 2 miles away from downtown St. Louis. 5 miles away from SLU Hospital, BJC Hospital. Your brand new kitchen has microwave, coffee maker, mixer, plates and cooking necessities. Suite has desk, smart Tv with Netflix, linens, towels, toiletries provided. Wifi included, shared washer/dryer. Free street parking. Well behaved pets are welcome for a fee.The spaceThis is basement studio with private entrance. Studio has full kitchen, queen size bed, sofa, smart tv, dining table, desk and full bathroom with shower. Entrance door is in the back of the house under deck. Go through garden gate on your right, 4 steps down to the back. We (family) live upstairs. We share washer/dryer which is in the basement, which is directly behind your unit. We share fenced backyard, with few seating areas set up for coffee, dinner, bbq grilling. Quiet hours are 11pm to 7am, we honor the same quiet hours we ask of our guests. We don’t like to disturb our guests more than a basement suite dictates, as noise level travels. Please note that sofa is not long enough for second adult to sleep on, bring your own air mattress.Let me know in advance, if you need playpen, or will use charcoal grill, so I can set it up for you.

more description: Walkable neighborhood close to Tower Grove Park, Missouri Botanical Garden, South Grand restaurant district, public transit, bars & nightlife, & easy distance from downtown & other lively urban areas. You’ll love the unique & thoughtful design & open layout. Filled with modern amenities but retaining it's historic charm, hardwood floors & reclaimed wood, large TV w/ cable & Roku. We take great pride in our high cleanliness standards. For couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, & families.The spaceExposed brick and timbers show off the craftsmanship in this historic building.  Reclaimed flooring has been re-purposed for the front and back of the bar.  A charming farmhouse sink and historic shower basin have stayed in the apartment from a renovation early last century.  These historic touches are thoroughly balanced by modern amenities including Wi-Fi & wired Ethernet, a large television with cable and Roku, closet organizer, and luxury waterfall shower with jets. Unit #1.

more description: Soulard apartments aren't supposed to be this luxurious! If you are searching for a place to stay in Soulard and don't necessarily want the old historic, cobblestone, 1800's theme permeating through your walls, then look no further! We confidently boast the newest and nicest apartments in Soulard. In addition, no high-end complex is better located in the "right" parts of town to get to and from all the places YOU want to be!The spaceThis luxury complex was designed for the modern day professional. Each unit boasts top of the line wood floors, granite counter-tops, and so much more!In addition to being fully furnished with designer pieces, your personal comfort was taken in to consideration. From the sheet thread count to the different types of plush and firm pillows, no corners were cut to take away from your enjoyment during your stay!

name: Apartment in St. Louis
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Stephanie2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Stay at our Tiny Cottage! Enjoy a quiet and private getaway all to yourself in a cozy cabin fully furnished with vintage decor from our neighboring antique shops. Just a few steps out the door and you can experience some of St. Louis' best indie cafes, taquerias, and bakeries. Your historic St. Louis brewery district.The spaceIncluded in your stay you get.....> to enjoy a full studio style apartment just steps away from historic shopping distrct> back alley access in between residential spaces for a more private and quiet stay> full kitchen with refrigerator, stove, high top bar w/stools to cook and enjoy meals just like at home> full bathroom with dressing room for comfort and privacy> full size double bed to accommodate 1-2 comfortably> living area with chairs and side table next to a big window to enjoy breakfast and morning coffee> full private workspace area/office to catch up on emails and plan your day here in St. Louis> free private gravel parking spot out of plain view right in front of the apartment for easy access with luggageThis charming little spot is about 400 sq ft and is located in the very middle of the Cherokee Art District and Antique Row.  Both historic and fresh in character.  We wanted to reflect that in the ambiance of the space.  You will find a wonderful mix of modern industrial fixtures and rustic antique decor.  All come together to express a true sense of history and Midwestern lifestyle.

name: Loft in St. Louis
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Zeina7 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 7 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in February 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Whether you are looking to get away for the weekend or looking for an extended stay this is the perfect place! With room up to 7 guest, the airy semi- open floor plan gives you a full kitchen, comfortable living room, huge windows and pool views!  This state of the art loft was designed to give you a upscale and vibrant New York City vibe. Our place is perfectly located between all of the major attractions and plenty of restaurants, cafes that we'd highly recommend.The spaceFully Equipped Kitchen for cooking, just bring your food! Brita Filter water pitcher is in fridge.Kuerig Coffee Maker Ninja BlenderAir FryerToasterTea KettleCrock Pot*Smart Tv, Workspace, Fast Wifi and Basic CableWasher & DryerThere is no high pressure in shower! Just average pressure. *The unit is not child proof but they are welcome at your own risk!*Home EssentialsToiletriesLinen/BlanketsTowels RobesSlippers1 complimentary cleaning for stays over 1 month long. This does not include laundry! There is a $250 security deposit required before check in for LOCAL GUEST ONLY!There is a $200 lost fob key! Please keep it with you at all times. *2 Queen beds sleep 2 people each*2 Futons in living room sleeps 1 person each*Twin size roller bed sleeps 1*In total this loft can accommodate 7!There is a $35 charge per night for every  guest over 4. For example 6 people 2 will pay $35 per night of stay. So, if you have 2 extra guest and stay 3 nights that is an additional $210 $35 per guest x 3 nights! The space is designed for 4 people, however it can accommodate 7 . Extra guest require extra cleaning and linen. The $35 per night accounts for that.The extra guest fee must be paid in full prior to arriving to suite to ensure that you have enough linen for all of your party! It is guest responsibility to send payment! Detailed Check In instructions & access code will be sent 2 days before your arrival!

description: Lofted 2nd Floor Apartment with Spiral Staircase
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Margaret4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath
more description: My place is close to the Blue Line, the highway, Downtown, Logan Square, Wicker Park, Bucktown, Humbolt Park, and Lincoln Park. You'll love my place because of the central location, free parking, delicious local restaurants, and easy commute to anywhere in the city. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travel, and families with kids. This is a new listing for the same unit I've been hosting for 4 years. Please click on my name and read all my reviews for this space!The spaceHello travelers! Welcome to our home in the city. This is a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom space with an attic loft. There is a queen bed in the bedroom, and two twin beds in the loft. This is a second floor unit located on Western Ave., so there is some noise from the street. It does quiet down at night and the bedroom is towards the rear of the apartment so if you're looking for a city apartment that's minutes from it all, this is the one!There is free street parking on Western Ave. The Blue Line Western stop is just a few blocks south. This is the train that runs from O'hare Airport all the way downtown. If you're driving, the Kennedy Expressway 94 is just 2 blocks north, off the Fullerton exit.There is a secure lock box with 2 keys for easy check-in. We have exterior security cameras for additional security. This also means we can see how many people come in and out of the apartment so please be honest when making your booking as any unapproved guests will be charged the additional guest fee. Any unapproved parties or gatherings will be charged the full security deposit. My husband and I designed and built this unit. We hope you enjoy this simple, cozy, no fuss place that's so close to it all!

description: McCormick Place Studio/parking/sleeps up to 4
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Milan4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath
more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• City view• Queen size bed + Queen size Air mattress for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 4 guests at a time• Access to the Gym• Dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Walk to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this Studio Suite (Sleeps 4) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. The suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. It is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 1 Queen bed in the unit for the initial two guests + Queen size Air mattress with fresh bedding is provided for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 4 people- Custom furnishing- Dedicated Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle. Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft lofted ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 7-9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.
